name: tcp-wave
label: TCP Wave
description: TCPWave offers automated DDI (DNS, DHCP, IPAM) workflow management, providing significant benefits to large-scale organizations. It reduces manual tasks, enhances IT productivity, and enables a focus on strategic initiatives that drive business growth. By standardizing network management processes, TCPWave enforces best practices and facilitates rapid, scalable service delivery.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: host
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL or IP address of the TCPWave server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the URL or IP address of the TCPWave server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: TIMS Session Token
fields.name: tims_session_token
fields.tooltip: Specify the TIMS Session Token to access the endpoint where you will perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the TIMS Session Token to access the endpoint where you will perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Protocol
fields.name: protocol
fields.tooltip: Specify the protocol to access the endpoint where you will perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the protocol to access the endpoint where you will perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Port
fields.name: port
fields.tooltip: Specify the port to access the endpoint where you will perform the automated operations. The default is set to 7443.
fields.description: Specify the port to access the endpoint where you will perform the automated operations. The default is set to 7443.

operations.title: Get Object Details By IP Address
operations.description: Provides the details of Object defined in the TCPWave IPAM based on the IP Address of the object.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address of the object you want to retrieve details for.
parameters.description: Specify the IP address of the object to retrieve its details from TCPWave IPAM.

operations.title: Check Object Exists
operations.description: Checks if the object exists in the TCPWave IPAM with the specified address.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address of the object you want to retrieve details for.
parameters.description: Specify the IP address of the object to retrieve its details from TCPWave IPAM.

parameters.title: Organization Name
parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the organization related to the network you want to investigate.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the organization associated with the network in TCPWave IPAM.

operations.title: Get Network Details by IP Address
operations.description: Provides the details of a Network defined in the TCPWave IPAM based on the IP Address of the Network.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address of the network you want to retrieve details for.
parameters.description: Specify the IP address of the network to retrieve its details from TCPWave IPAM.
